analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol:
	Contract MilestonePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#606-618):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#617-618)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#618)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#445-504):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#454-467)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#469-473)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#489-490)

	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#494-496)

	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#522-526)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#530-531)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#758-790) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#773-790)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#779-790)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0xafe4eb0f65f94e1bae3c31b0f1dca72bc10b36aa.sol#299-301)
